events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product does not meet my expectations and I would like to request a refund.
The reported issue has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle the customer's case and follow up accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to help you through this process.
Could you please provide your order number and details about why you are requesting a refund to help us process it faster?
My order number is 123456. The product was defective and did not work as described, so I would like my money back as soon as possible.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once the process is complete.
Thank you for your prompt response and for initiating the refund quickly. I appreciate your assistance with this matter.
The refund has been successfully processed. You should receive the credited amount within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and to check if you need any further assistance.
As the refund process has been confirmed complete and no further issues were reported, your case has now been closed. Thank you!
